level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 1103(g) of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-601.01.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-253, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-623.01.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-52, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-623.10.
